name: Rad-Way
description:
This is my first game I am really working on, it's a story about a slime and his adventure, the special thing about this slime is that he is made of pure radiation making his path and action a bit special.

This is a super early demo where there is only the tutorial

I plan on adding one level for the early demo a first world for the normal demo and the full game should have around 9 worlds and between 45-90 levels in the main story and probably some side level

The assets in the demo is not mine, I plan on making custom assets later but for now I focus on the gameplay and mechanics

Ps: I am really bad at art stuff so the thumbnail is not really good
